org.apache.pig.piggybank.storage.avro

Class PigAvroDatumWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.avro.generic.GenericDatumWriter<java.lang.Object>
      • org.apache.pig.piggybank.storage.avro.PigAvroDatumWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.avro.io.DatumWriter<java.lang.Object>

    public class PigAvroDatumWriter
extends org.apache.avro.generic.GenericDatumWriter<java.lang.Object>
    An avro GenericDatumWriter to write pig data as Avro data.
